DOC.brief_summary: Platelets are a component of blood, which contain factors which can enhance wound healing. This study proposes to evaluate the clinical response of laugh lines treated with a concentrated preparation of the subject's own platelets injected into or under the skin by taking serial photographs of the subject's face over a 12 week period. Also, the same preparation will be injected into or under the skin of the arm near the elbows, and serial biopsies will be taken over a 12 week period.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Evaluation of Platelet Rich Fibrin Matrix (PRFM) for the Correction of Nasolabial Folds
DOC.criteria: healthy adults aged 25 75 years with moderate to severe nasolabial folds pregnant allergy to local anesthetics history of bleeding disorder active infection at the treatment site injectable filler in the nasolabial folds within past year
